TextView.android:text: What type of data do we collect

The types of information we collect depend on how you use our productsWe collect the content and other information you provide when you use Piktofill,inclding when you sign up for an account, create or share content This can include information in or about the content you provide. It can also include what you see through features we provide, such as our camera.

Account information. To create an account, you must provide a username and password. Your username is public, and it doesnâ€™t have to be related to your real name. You may also provide an email address. We also store your user account preferences and settings.

Content you submit. We collect the content you submit to the Services. This includes your posts and comments including saved drafts, and your reports and other communications with us. Your content may include text, images

Actions you take. We collect information about the actions you take when using the Services. This includes your interactions with content, like Liking, saving, and reporting. It also includes your interactions with other users, such as following,status.

Other information. You may choose to provide other information directly to us. For example, we may collect information when you fill out user poll form or promotions, apply for a job, request customer support or otherwise communicate with us.
How we use information about you
How information about you is shared

When you submit content (such as a post or comment) to the Services, any visitors to and users of our Services will be able to see that content, the username associated with the content. Although some parts of the Services may be private or quarantined, they may become public and you should take that into consideration before posting to the Services.
Please note that, even when you delete your account, the posts, comments and messages you submit through the Services may still be viewable or available on our servers.
we do not share, sell, or give away your personal information to third parties
